profileText: a Representative from Arizona; born in Hermosillo, Sonora, Mexico, August 31, 1982; graduated from Rincon High School, Tucson, Ariz.; A.A., Pima Community College, Tucson, Ariz., 2003; B.A., University of Arizona, Tucson, Ariz., 2005; senior program development specialist, University of Arizona, Tucson, Ariz., 2006-2011; membership director and vice president of outreach, Tucson, Ariz., Hispanic chamber of commerce, 2011-2014; staff, office of Arizona Governor Doug Ducey, 2015-2022; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
